column1: Katpadi (pronounced [kaːtpaːdi]) is a locality in Vellore
column2: at the northern part of Vellore city in the state of Tamil Nadu
column3: India. Located on the gauge line between Chennai-Bangalore and Villupuram-Tirupati
column4: it is home to Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT).

column2: Katpadi was upgraded to a panchayat town
column3: with its own taluk office. It has a major assembly constituency which is part of Arakkonam (Lok Sabha constituency).

column1: Katpadi is no longer a separate municipal unit and has become part of Vellore City Municipal Corporation (VCMC). The two places are collectively known as Vellore and together form the eighth-largest metropolis in Tamil Nadu.Katpadi lies in the northern side of the Palar River with the Andhra Pradesh.The railway station is location on Cuddalor - Chittor State Highway
The Vellore Institute of Technology University (VIT) is in Katpadi. In 2010 it was ranked as one of the best private engineering universities in India.

Katpadi Junction is located in the city of (4 km from) Vellore and is the largest railway junction in the city and the district. It is one of the most important railway junctions in Southern Railway. Chittoor bus stand is named for once being the starting point for all Chittoor
